Description: Solidarity Saudi Takaful (known as: Solidarity) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since June 2010. Solidarity operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Multi-line Insurance. It has company operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Property and Casualty Insurance. Solidarity is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in May 2010.

Shareholder Name: Ashraf Adnan Nour Al Din Bseisu
